QuestData.Title: Stealing Its Thunder
QuestData.Description:
It's you! Thank Ohn'ahra. I was pretending to be hurt to fool the next brute who dared come in here. Ugh--the hoof lickers put some binding spell on me. I'll figure it out.
They've got Lizi in the cave. Please save her. I'll figure out how to free myself.
Do what you have to do.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill the Storm Extractors and rescue Lizi the Thunderspine in Kaighan Camp.
QuestData.RewardText: <Radiya is unusually quiet and trembling slightly as she looks upon the tortured beast.>
